content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Jun 2019Hi, is anyone familiar with the sell limit for DBS Vickers Online trading account linked to MCA ?I am a 21 year old student and I just opened a DBS Vickers Online Trading account linked to MCA. The sell limit for my account is only $75 so I can't sell the stocks that I have bought using cash upfront. I read online that I have to email them to increase my limit but I do not have any income tax or salary statement since I'm still studying. Do I email them my CDP Portfolio instead?1 answerAnswerBump0

TWTay WenHaoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 22 Jun 2019Hi, perhaps just call the Vickers Hotline during working hours and mention that you would like to sell off the stocks then they will temporary increase the limit0 comments0
